content: Created a minimal GitHub Actions CI workflow at `.github/workflows/ci.yml` that sets up a clean Python environment, installs pinned dependencies from `requirements.txt`, runs pre-commit lint/format checks, and executes the pytest suite.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('.github/workflows/ci.yml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""name: CI
on:
  push:
    branches: ["**"]
  pull_request:

permissions:
  contents: read

concurrency:
  group: ci-${{ github.ref }}
  cancel-in-progress: true""",
"""jobs:
  checks:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      fail-fast: false
      matrix:
        python-version: ["3.11"]
    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: ${{ matrix.python-version }}
          cache: pip

      - name: Install dependencies (pinned)
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
          if [ -f requirements-dev.txt ]; then python -m pip install -r requirements-dev.txt; fi
          python -m pip install pre-commit pytest
          python -m pip check

      - name: Lint / format (pre-commit)
        run: pre-commit run --all-files --show-diff-on-failure

      - name: Test suite
        run: pytest -q"""
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Created a minimal GitHub Actions CI workflow at `.github/workflows/ci.yml` that sets up a clean Python environment, installs pinned dependencies from `requirements.txt`, runs pre-commit lint/format checks, and executes the pytest suite.
